name: Underwater Basket Weaving - VIC 20
description:
Underwater Basket Weaving is a pick-up-and-play puzzle game by Jeffrey Daniels.  It is made entirely in BASIC for the unexpanded VIC 20.  Use the keyboard or joystick to replicate the weave pattern before you run out of air.  

Control with number keys or a JOYSTICK  (ARROW keys in emulation).
